Detailed Description

An implementation of the RTRManagedBoolean base class which provides modification operations and uses the global instance of RTRMOServerMemPool for storage allocation.

If modifyEnabled is true (default value is false), then consumers will be permitted to modify the active value.

See Also:
RTRPublicObject, RTRPublicString, RTRPublicNumeric, RTRPublicCounter, RTRPublicGauge RTRPublicNumericRange, RTRPublicStringConfig, RTRPublicNumericConfig, RTRPublicBooleanConfig, RTRPublicGaugeConfig
